title: Downloading the game?
body:
Hi everytime I try to download the game it just goes to something like  connection error and won't download the game. https://gyazo.com/92f8a132de932057b37600f8cbdcbacc 
Played this game for a long time just quit for a little while and never had this happen before,

replies.body:
Ah, this issue is likely caused by a problem with your DNS not redirecting you to the right page. You should be able to resolve this by configuring your DNS using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).

Please let me know if this helped.
